original_text: also one male goat for a sin offering, besides the regular burnt offering, its grain offering and its drink offering.
korean_text: 상번제와 그 소제와 그 전제 외에 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: also one male goat for a sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 속죄제를 위한 수염소 한 마리

sentences.original_text: its grain offering and its drink offering
